EmailTemplate.name: Choosing the right school
EmailTemplate.subject: How to choose the right school...
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
I've been speaking with pre-school parents recently regarding "choosing the right school for your child". As someone who went through the Kindergarten enrolment process myself last year (and also works in enrolments at a school), I can provide an objective overview on how to evaluate and select a school.
I would love to come and present to the parents of {!Account.Name} and provide an unbiased guide to school selection criteria and enrolment processes. I can also bring along a copy of "101 Questions to ask your school" which provide a list of questions for parents to ask potential schools.
I can present at your centre during lunchtime or do an evening presentation. Please note: this is not a marketing activity of St Andrew's, nor does my presentation contain any advertising for the school. It's just objective advice provided with insider knowledge!
If you would like me to present at your centre, just contact me and we will arrange a time.
Regards
Robyn
